title: STEAM-Based Digital Making for Creative Problem-Solving Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary programming concepts and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: STEAM program linked to language education, conducting problem-solving activities using smartphone-based block coding tools

learning_goals: Learners can creatively solve STEAM-integrated problems using the PBL-DM (Project-Based Learning-Design Model) approach
Learners can demonstrate the creativity (originality, utility, aesthetic completeness) of their outputs through digital making activities
Learners can complete language education-linked projects using block-based programming in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
